Html: I have a case where I am expected to handle PST files that have been protected with a password. Is there any way of handling a password-protected PST file,if the password is known?
PSTSDK ignores passwords set on pst files.

recover pst password lost or forgotten passwords of MS Outlook. Tool recovers passwords for password-protected Microsoft Outlook data, for POP3/IMAP/HTML mail servers. Software saves recovered password settings of mail accounts, including the settings of IMAP and HTML mail accounts into new file without changing source data.
